settings.sub_heading_big: 2000 self-dissolving microcrystals for a targeted skincare therapy with 4D Hyaluronic Acid
settings.review_text: "It helped me get rid of hyperpigmentation and now my skin looks so much brighter after just one month."

settings.tab_content_1:
The 2000 innovative self-dissolving microcrystals, packed with powerful active ingredients, penetrate into the deep layers of your skin, in a non-invasive way, by pressing directly into targeted areas of the skin.

The Glow Stamp allows a precise approach for isolated areas that have imperfections such as hyperpigmentation or post-zit scarring and redness. 

The Glow Stamp will effectively deliver 4D Hyaluronic Acid and other major active ingredients to stimulate the skin's own natural healing process, thus triggering collagen and elastin production and helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles, hyperpigmentation, or other imperfections.

Premium Targeted Skincare Therapy For Bright & Smooth Skin
PREORDER NOW SHIPS IN 60 DAYS

settings.text: OMMA is not just another skincare brand, its story roots deeply into my life and was created as a pinnacle of my healing journey, with the love and support of my husband and partner.

The Glow Stamp uses microscopic anti-aging & brightening microcrystals made of active ingredients that self-dissolve in contact with the skin, while penetrating the deeper layers and targeting any imperfections. There is no risk of damaging your skin or any sterilization needed, as each stamp head is ready to be used immediately.
This is the major difference that makes the Glow Stamp superior to all other microneedle devices on the market, which have metallic, long needles that require sterilization after each use and have the high risk of damaging your skin.

settings.title: 4 x Self-dissolving Microcrystal Stamps
settings.desc:
Description
Replaceable stamps with 2000 self-dissolving microcrystals containing active 4D Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C and Madecassoside which recreates your skin’s natural glow, trigger collagen and elastin production and help reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and hyperpigmentation. 

Frequency
Once or twice a week, PM

Suitable for type of skin
All skin types, Sensitive Skin, Aging Skin

Recommended for trouble(s)
Hyperpigmentation, Age Spots, Anti-aging, Wrinkles, Skin Regeneration,

Ingredients
Sodium Hyaluronate, Cellulose Gum, Glycerin, Trehalose, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin,  Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate

settings.title: 1 x Glow Serum
settings.desc:
Description
A powerful anti-wrinkle & lifting serum with Soy Isoflavones which stimulates collagen production and skin regeneration, formulated with soothing Centella Asiatica Extract, four types of moisturizing Hyaluronic Acid, and Triple Peptides. When applied regularly with the Glow Roller or the Glow Stamp, the absorption of the serum’s active ingredients is increased by more than 300%, making your skin more firm and elastic and creating a healthy pro-collagen environment, whether you use it on your face, neck, chin, or décolleté.

Frequency
Once or twice a week, pm

Suitable for type of skin
All skin types, Sensitive Skin, Aging Skin

Recommended for trouble(s)
Anti-aging, Against wrinkles, Lifting, Moisturizing, Regeneration, Smoothing

Ingredients
Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Trehalose, Betaine, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Damascena Callus Culture Extract, Algin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Carbomer, Arginine, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance, Centella Asiatica Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Madecassoside, Polysorbate 80, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Copper Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-

settings.title: 1 x Stamp Handle
settings.desc:
Description
A slick handle of the finest quality that is lightweight so you can easily feel and control the intensity and the light pressure on to the skin, resulting in optimal balance.

settings.title: what you get in the kit
Jojoba Oil
settings.desc: Clinically proven effective on deep pimples and blackheads and has unique skin-soothing properties.

settings.title: Arginine
settings.desc: Arginine is an amino acid naturally present in the body, considered essential to human development. As a skin care ingredient, itdelivers antioxidant benefits and plays a role in repairing visible skin damage. Additionally, arginine's hydration properties have been studied in depth.

settings.title: Centella Asiatica
settings.desc: Antioxidant, soothes inflammation, redness, and irritated skin. Firms skin while fighting breakouts and boosts collagen levels!

settings.title: 4D Hyaluronic Acid
settings.desc: Four types of Hyaluronic Acid locking in moisture from the outside of the skin and improving elasticity, restoring your glow.

settings.title: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.desc: Occurs naturally in the skin. It is an excellent moisture binder, hydrates and soothes the skin, and prevents moisture loss.

settings.title: 21% Triple Peptide Solution

settings.title: Why try the microcrystals Glow Stamp?
settings.text:
Why not spoil and pamper yourself with premium targeted skin therapy at home? Small things can make a big difference. So small that you can barely see them... That’s how tiny the Glow Stamp microcrystals are.

And the big difference? Well, it’s actually a double difference:

• Firstly, the 2000 noninvasive 250um microscopic microcrystals safely stimulate skin cell renewal and trigger collagen and elastin production. 

• Secondly, unlike regular needle dermarollers, the Glow Stamp has self-dissolving microcrystals which deliver active ingredients deep inside repairing hyperpigmentation, age spots, post-zit marks and fine lines.

settings.title: Why you'll love it?
settings.text: Microcrystals represent the new generation of innovations in acne care and we strongly believe in the technology and science behind the product and have created a unique active ingredients formula designed to be effective and that actually works.

settings.title: When to use the Glow Stamp?
settings.text:
Aging is something we should embrace because it happens to everybody, but how we do it makes the difference and prolonging for as long as possible a healthy and youthful skin should be our focus.

I do not promise miracles, but instead, I promise our product actually works, as I have tested them all on myself first. The Glow Stamp can definitely help you to precisely target small isolated, prevent wrinkles and fine lines, or treat aging signs.

Used once or twice a week, the glow stamp can definitely maintain or restore your skin's natural glow. 

With microcrystals, you start your #skinourney from within towards your ideal self, renewed and more self-aware of your own being.

settings.title: How to use the Glow Stamp
settings.text:
Step 1
Cleanse and dry your face
You can use your preferred cleanser.

Step 2
Take one stamp head out of the package and attach it to the handle. Gently press the stamp on your face and/or the targeted area for 5 to 10 minutes.
Once you start to gently stamp your face, the microcrystals rapidly penetrate your skin, dissolve and deliver the unique active ingredients formula and start working their magic.

Step 3
Apply serum and continue stamping for another 5 minutes.(Dispose of stamp head after use).
The serum brings extra helpful ingredients which penetrate the skin much easier and faster.
By continuing to gently stamp after the serum, you ensure all the stamp microcrystals are completely dissolved and also push the serum more into your skin.

Use once or twice a week.

settings.title: What about the price?
settings.text:
The WOW patches are underpriced for something so effective and, in the long run, these will actually save you money! 

Just think about how much you’ll save by stopping using tiring acne routines with creams that struggle to reach deep below the skin.

settings.title: Free shipping and fulfillment info
settings.text:
•We currently offer free shipping for our standard shipping method.
•We ship from Salt Lake City and all orders are shipped using DHL, USPS or FEDEX
•These services are fully trackable once the couriers have your order.

Shipping fees:
•Standard shipping is FREE for all orders during the Official Launch.
•For Express shipping, a flat rate of $15 is charged at checkout.

Transit time:
•For Standard Free shipping, transit time is usually between 3 and 4 Business Days from the time your order is dispatched. 
•For Express shipping, transit time is usually between 1 and 2 Business Days from the time your order is dispatched. 

Processing time:
•All orders are processed pending availability and payment verification. •Orders are processed in max. 2 working days (orders placed between Friday, 2 pm, and 8 am Monday, will be processed starting on Monday).

settings.title: Why preorder it?
settings.text:
OMMA preorders are available for our most popular items so that you can reserve them before they arrive. 

Popular products frequently sell out before they arrive and the advantage is you'll benefit from a preorder major discount and also ensure that your item will be reserved.

Once the preorder period expires, these products are sold at full price. So, why not take advantage of the 50% preorder discount now?

When you place your order to confirm your reservation, your payment is processed and completed. 

The stimated shipping time is for 60 days. Preorders may be cancelled at any time prior to shipping. Let us know at support@ommacosmetics.com if you would like to cancel your preorder.

settings.title: Why made in South Korea?
settings.text:
Everyone knows South Korea is the innovator in the beauty space and no other comes close in this area.

K-Beauty cosmetics are world-wide renowned for a good reason, as they represent the perfect combination of science and the power of natural ingredients.

settings.title: Why buy from OMMA?
settings.text:
It's simple: because the products actually work!

OMMA is not just another skincare brand, its story roots deeply into my life and was created as a pinnacle of my healing journey. You can support a small business while also benefiting from great products crafted with care and passion.

I hope the products we carefully created will help you as much as they helped me.

OMMA represents the change love can have on your skin, in all its forms.

From feeling the love of your partner who supports you when you’re at your lowest, the love of a good friend who understands why you may be distant sometimes and encourages you to overcome your suffering, or the love you have for yourself, your body, your skin, just the way it is – understanding that it’s protecting you the way it knows best.
